name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building e-commerce infrastructure at scale.
I care about making tools that work. Not perfect tools, not impressive tools—tools that solve real problems without getting in the way.
Started coding in 2011. Shipped 425+ repos, accumulated ~1,800 stars. Most of my work lives in Go and TypeScript, lately focused on AI tooling and Model Context Protocol implementations.
Co-founded aiocean.io—side project building developer tools. Write at 12bit.vn (technical) and onepercent.plus (product thinking).
Founded Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016 when the framework was still new. Grew it to thousands of developers before stepping back.
I believe in iteration over planning, shipping over perfecting, and real usage over theoretical elegance. Build things people actually use, then make them better.
